Question.Subject: Canon sx40 or canon s100 ?
Question.Content: Which one should i get ? Its prettty much the same $$$ , please advice !?????!!!!

ChosenAnswer:
Go with the S100.
It's more compact, ISO 6400 capability (SX40 only 3200), faster lens at f/2 and the SX40 only f/2.7.
Both have full 1080 video with stereo recording, so that doesn't matter. The S100 has a slightly larger screen and the new digic 5 processor.
